p: Both models predict spatiotemporally varying incidence of YF infections. We assumed that 12% (95% CI: 5% to 26%) of all infections develop severe disease and a case fatality ratio among severe cases of 47% (95% CI: 31% to 62%) [ 18] to translate infection incidence estimates into numbers of severe cases, deaths and disability-adjusted life years (DALYs) lost ( S1 Appendix).
